## OpsMetrics interface

Regroups metrics gathered by all the collectors. This contains metrics about the os/runtime, the OpenSearch Dashboards process and the http server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OpsMetrics 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [collected\_at](./opensearch-dashboards.opsmetrics.collected_at.md) | Date | Time metrics were recorded at. |
|  [concurrent\_connections](./opensearch-dashboards.opsmetrics.concurrent_connections.md) | [OpsServerMetrics](./opensearch-dashboards.opsservermetrics.md)<!-- -->\['concurrent\_connections'\] | number of current concurrent connections to the server |
|  [os](./opensearch-dashboards.opsmetrics.os.md) | [OpsOsMetrics](./opensearch-dashboards.opsosmetrics.md) | OS related metrics |
|  [process](./opensearch-dashboards.opsmetrics.process.md) | [OpsProcessMetrics](./opensearch-dashboards.opsprocessmetrics.md) | Process related metrics |
|  [requests](./opensearch-dashboards.opsmetrics.requests.md) | [OpsServerMetrics](./opensearch-dashboards.opsservermetrics.md)<!-- -->\['requests'\] | server requests stats |
|  [response\_times](./opensearch-dashboards.opsmetrics.response_times.md) | [OpsServerMetrics](./opensearch-dashboards.opsservermetrics.md)<!-- -->\['response\_times'\] | server response time stats |
